name: Piece of Ship Game III
description:
Piece of Ship Game is a Multiplayer Planetarium Dome game.  Players fly tiny ships to assemble the Bigelow Space Hotel.

Player must co-operate to drill through asteroids, clear a path, more space station pieces, and bring batteries to power dead ships. 

Lead Engineer: Theory Georgiou

Artist Anthony Bagsby, Juan Rivera

Audio: Steven Wheeler

Special thanks: Patricio Delgado
